Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO VETERANS' AFFAIRS
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Establishes a lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender veterans coordinator
Summary: Establishes a lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender veterans coordinator in order to support the unique needs of, advocate for, and celebrate the service of such veterans.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, add ยง19-a, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to establishing a lesbian, gay, bisexual, and transgender veterans coordinator in order to support the unique needs of and celebrate the service by such veterans
